posts.post_content:
I have the following T201's for outright sale that are in really nice condition as described and shown. Shipping with insurance is $5 (Lush / Hauser is $3). PayPal is acceptable. PM or email to reserve.

Cards include:

Huggins / Breshnahan - EXMT - $300
[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/picture.php?albumid=15&pictureid=1599[/IMG]

Brown / Hofman - EX+ - $120 
[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/picture.php?albumid=15&pictureid=1597[/IMG]

Evers / Chance - EX - $175
[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/picture.php?albumid=15&pictureid=1600[/IMG]

Crawford / Cobb - EX+ - $900
[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/picture.php?albumid=15&pictureid=1596[/IMG]

Lush / Hauser - EX - A couple of light surface indentations (pencil point size) that don't break the paper - $45
[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/picture.php?albumid=15&pictureid=1601[/IMG]

Summers / Jennings - EX - $100
[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/picture.php?albumid=15&pictureid=1595[/IMG]
